query: My name is James. Could you create a 3-day travel plan for me and my friend departing Charlotte to Miami, with a budget of $1400? We love Italian food and don't want to drive.
Hi, I'm Emily. Please design a 2-day trip from Boston to Seattle for just me with an $800 budget. I'll rent a car and I enjoy Chinese and American food.

My name is Michael, I will travel to Orlando, Florida. I will travel from 2025-12-21 for three days with my girlfriend. My budget is $3000, no kid. i prefer outdoor activities and I need to rent a car. For hotel, I prefer 1 king bed and we like Asian cuisine.

My name is Michael, I will travel to Miami Florida. I will travel from 2025-12-21 for three days with my girlfriend. My budget is $3000, no kid. i prefer outdoor activities and I need to rent a car. For hotel, I prefer 1 king bed and we like Asian cuisine.

My name is Tianyi, I will travel to nyc. I will travel from 2025-12-26 myself for 2 days. My budget is $3000, no kid. I prefer indoor activities and I donâ€™t need to rent a car. For the hotel, I prefer 1 queen bed and I like seafood.
My name is Robert. Can you make a 5-day travel itinerary for 3 people going from New York to San Francisco with a $3500 budget? We like Chinese, Italian, and Mexican food and prefer not to drive.

My name is Sarah, planning a family trip to Chicago. We are 4 people (2 adults, 2 kids) traveling from 2025-12-20 for 4 days. Budget is $5000. We love museums and deep dish pizza. Need a rental car and a hotel with 2 queen beds.

Hi, I'm David. Taking my wife to Las Vegas for 3 days starting 2025-12-28. Budget $4000. We want to see shows and enjoy fine dining (steakhouses). No car needed, we'll use taxis. Prefer a luxury hotel with a king bed.

Solo trip to San Diego! I'm Alex, traveling alone from 2026-01-05 for 5 days. Budget $2500. I want to visit the zoo and beaches. I'll rent a car. Love Mexican food and seafood. Hotel with a queen bed please.
